Prepare ASCS
```{r}
ASCS<-left_join(filter(cleaned_survey_data, grepl("ASCS",item)) %>% 
                   mutate(value=as.numeric(value)) %>% 
                   filter(!is.na(value)) %>% 
                   distinct(tagid,item,value,survey_name,.keep_all = FALSE) %>% 
                   spread(item,value),
                 redcap_cleaned %>%
                   filter(!is.na(dob),!is.na(sa_date)) %>%
                   dplyr::select(tagid, sa_date, sb_date, dob),by="tagid")

ASCS_Wave1<-left_join(ASCS,survey_date, by = c("tagid","survey_name")) %>% 
  distinct(tagid,survey_name,.keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(qualtrics_date=value) %>% 
  dplyr::select(-value) %>%
  mutate(survey_date=ifelse(survey_name=="TAG - Sess 1 - V4 - Current",sa_date,
                            ifelse(survey_name=="TAG - Sess 1 - V1",sa_date,
                                   ifelse(survey_name=="TAG - Sess 1 - V2",sa_date,
                                          ifelse(survey_name=="TAG - Sess 1 - V3",sa_date,
                                                 ifelse(survey_name=="Sensitive Q's for 042",sb_date,as.character(qualtrics_date)
                                                 )))))) %>%
  dplyr::select(-qualtrics_date,-sb_date,-sa_date,-dob) %>%
  distinct(tagid,survey_name,.keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(ASCS_N=10,
         ASCS_missing=rowSums(is.na(cbind(ASCS_1,ASCS_2,ASCS_3,ASCS_4,ASCS_5,
                                          ASCS_6,ASCS_7,ASCS_8,ASCS_9,ASCS_10))),
         ASCS_missing_perc=100*(rowSums(is.na(cbind(ASCS_1,ASCS_2,ASCS_3,ASCS_4,ASCS_5,
                                          ASCS_6,ASCS_7,ASCS_8,ASCS_9,ASCS_10)))/10),
         ASCS_total=rowSums(cbind(ASCS_1,ASCS_2,ASCS_3,ASCS_4,ASCS_5,
                                          ASCS_6,ASCS_7,ASCS_8,ASCS_9,ASCS_10), na.rm = F),
         ASCS_mean=rowMeans(cbind(ASCS_1,ASCS_2,ASCS_3,ASCS_4,ASCS_5,
                                          ASCS_6,ASCS_7,ASCS_8,ASCS_9,ASCS_10), na.rm = T))

## Save it
ASCS_Wave1_TAG2_outdf <- ASCS_Wave1 %>% filter(!grepl("W2|W3|W4|W5|W6",survey_name)) %>% 
  filter(!grepl("TAG0|TAG1|TAG2",tagid))
write.csv(ASCS_Wave1_TAG2_outdf, file = paste0(workdir,"Qualtrics_Output/Wave1/ASCS_Wave1_TAG2.csv"))

ASCS_Wave2_TAG2_outdf <- ASCS_Wave1 %>% filter(grepl("W2",survey_name)) %>% 
  filter(!grepl("TAG0|TAG1|TAG2",tagid))
write.csv(ASCS_Wave2_TAG2_outdf, file = paste0(workdir,"Qualtrics_Output/Wave2/ASCS_Wave2_TAG2.csv"))
```
